instructions: On your Android phone, open the Chrome app . At the top right, tap More and then New tab .
On your Android tablet, open the Chrome app . At the top, next to your open tabs, tap New tab .

On your Android phone, open the Chrome app . To the right, tap Switch tabs . You'll see your open Chrome tabs. At the top right of the tab you want to close, tap Close . You can also swipe to close the tab.
On your Android phone, open the Chrome app . To the right of the address bar, tap Switch tabs . You'll see your open Chrome tabs. Tap More and then Close all tabs .
On your Android tablet, open the Chrome app . On any tab you want to close, tap Close .
On your Android tablet, open the Chrome app . On any tab, touch and hold Close . Tap Close all tabs .
On your Android phone, open the Chrome app . To the right of the address bar, tap Switch tabs . You'll see your open Chrome tabs. Swipe up or down. Tap the tab you want to switch to.
On your Android tablet, open the Chrome app . Tap the tab you want to switch to.
On your Android phone, open the Chrome app . To the right of the address bar, tap More . Tap Reload .
On your Android tablet, open the Chrome app . At the top left, tap Reload .
